meanings.sent1: She snapped a few shots of the sunset.
meanings.sent2: The photographer captured beautiful shots of the flowers.
meanings.sent3: The shots she took at the party were all blurry.
meanings.sent4: His shots of the city skyline were like postcards.
meanings.sent5: The shots from her camera were full of vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: He ordered two shots of tequila at the bar.
meanings.sent2: The bartender poured a shot of whiskey for the customer.
meanings.sent3: She couldn't handle more than a couple of shots.
meanings.sent4: The shot of vodka burned on the way down.
meanings.sent5: The shots they drank were strong and bitter.

meanings.definition: An attempt to score in a game or sport
meanings.sent1: The basketball player made a few shots from the three-point line.
meanings.sent2: He took a shot at the goal but missed.
meanings.sent3: Her shots at winning the game were getting better.
meanings.sent4: The final shot of the match determined the winner.
meanings.sent5: His shots at scoring were precise and powerful.
